## Quick Start

```bash
# Get started in 30 seconds
git clone https://github.com/nipunbatra/collage-maker.git
cd collage-maker && pip install -r requirements.txt

# Download sample images
python collage_maker.py --download-samples

# Create your first masterpiece
python collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style mandala

# With stunning backgrounds
python collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style mandala --background sunset
python collage_maker.py --folder sample_images --style grid --background noir

# See all options
python collage_maker.py --list-styles
python collage_maker.py --list-backgrounds
```
